mapper.select:
select count(*) sl,sum(pfztz) pfztz,decode(sfylrbwqk,'是',decode(sum(jhsybzje),null,0,sum(jhsybzje))) jhsybzje,sum(jhsydfzcje) jhsydfzcje,decode(sfylrbwqk,'否',decode(sum(shengbz),null,0,sum(shengbz))) shengbz from (select t.*,xm.xzqhdm,xm.gydwbm,xm.lxmc,xm.qlmc,xm.jsdj,xm.akjfl,xm.lxbm from plan_wqgz t join sck_wqgz sc on t.sckid=sc.sckid join xmk_wqgz xm on xmkid=xm.id where 1=1
and t.sfylrbwqk like '%'||(#{sfylrbwqk})||'%'
and xm.tsdq like '%'||#{tsdq}||'%' ) t where 1=1 and gydwbm like '1%'
${gydw}
${xzqhdm}
and lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and qlmc like '%'||(#{qlmc})||'%'
and jsdj like '%'||(#{jsdj})||'%'
and akjfl like #{akjfl}||'%'
and sfylsjl like #{sfylsjl}||'%'
and lxbm like (#{lxbm})||'%'
and sbnf like '%'||(#{sbnf})||'%'
and decode(JH_SBTHCD,#{sbthcd},'未上报',decode(SBZT,0,'未上报',1,'已上报'))=#{sbzt}
and decode(SPZT,0,'未审核',1,'已审核')=#{shzt}
group by sfylrbwqk
select sckid,sc.jsxz,sc.sck_qlbh,scqlqk,scqlqc,xm.tsdq,xm.akjfl,sc.sfylrbwqk,sc.bzls from sck_wqgz sc left join xmk_wqgz xm on sc.xmkid=xm.id where sckid=#{value}
mapper.update: update plan_wqgz set sbzt='1',sbsj=sysdate,sbbm=#{sbbm},jh_sbthcd=#{sbthcd},shzt1='已审核',shyj1='同意' where id=#{id}
update plan_wqgz set sbzt='0',sbsj=sysdate,sbbm=#{sbbm},jh_sbthcd=#{sbthcd},shzt1='未审核',shyj1=#{shyj1} where id=#{id}
update plan_wqgz set spzt='1',spsj=sysdate,spbm=#{sbbm},jh_sbthcd=#{sbthcd},shzt='已审核',shyj='同意' where id=#{id}
update plan_wqgz set spzt='0',spsj=sysdate,spbm=#{sbbm},jh_sbthcd=#{sbthcd},shzt='未审核',shyj=#{shyj1} where id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select xm.sqs v_1,xm.xsq v_2,xm.szxz v_3,xm.qlmc v_4,xm.qlbh v_5,xm.lxbm v_6,xm.lxmc v_7,decode(substr(xm.lxbm,0,1),'G','国道','S','省道','X','县道','Y','乡道','C','村道') v_8,xm.jsdj v_9,xm.qlzxzh v_10,xm.xjgjnd v_11,xm.qlqc v_12,xm.akjfl v_13,xm.synf v_14,xm.kjzc v_15,xm.dkzdkj v_16,xm.sjhspl v_17,xm.qxjkuan v_18,xm.qxjkong v_19,xm.zqks v_20,xm.qmjk v_21,xm.kydwlx v_22,xm.thdj v_23,xm.glqlyt v_24,xm.sbjgxs v_25,xm.qdlx v_26,xm.qtlx v_27,xm.pzlx v_28,xm.pddj v_29,xm.xmnf v_30,xm.qlyhgcs v_31,xm.qljggcs v_32,sc.scqlqk v_33,sc.scqlqk v_34,sc.scxmnf v_35,sc.fapgdw v_36,sc.fascdw v_37,sc.faspsj v_38,sc.spwh v_39,sc.jsxz v_40,sc.tzgs v_41,sc.sjdwmc v_42,sc.hzdj v_43,sc.sjhspl v_44,sc.kjzh v_45,sc.sck_sbjgxs v_46,sc.sck_xbjgxs v_47,sc.sgtpfsj v_48,sc.pfwh v_49,sc.zgq v_50,sc.rksj v_51,sc.cjqz v_52,sc.scthdj v_53,sc.qljc v_54,sc.ydgldj v_55,sc.sjsd v_56,sc.ztz v_57,sc.nsqbbz v_58,t.jhqlqc v_59,t.jhqlqk v_60,t.sbnf v_61,t.jhkgsj v_62,t.jhwgsj v_63,t.sjdw v_64,t.sjpfdw v_65,t.pfwh v_66,t.pfsj v_67,t.sfsqablbz v_68,t.ablbzsqwh v_69,t.pfztz v_70,decode(t.sfylrbwqk,'是',t.jhsybzje,'否',t.shengbz) v_71,t.jhsydfzcje v_72,t.bz v_73 from plan_wqgz t join sck_wqgz sc on t.sckid=sc.sckid join xmk_wqgz xm on xmkid=xm.id where 1=1 and gydwbm like '1%'
and t.sfylrbwqk like '%'||(#{sfylrbwqk})||'%'
and xm.tsdq like '%'||#{tsdq}||'%'
${gydw}
${xzqhdm}
and lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and qlmc like '%'||(#{qlmc})||'%'
and jsdj like '%'||(#{jsdj})||'%'
and akjfl like #{akjfl}||'%'
and sfylsjl like #{sfylsjl}||'%'
and lxbm like (#{lxbm})||'%'
and sbnf like '%'||(#{sbnf})||'%'
and decode(JH_SBTHCD,#{sbthcd},'未上报',decode(SBZT,0,'未上报',1,'已上报'))=#{sbzt}
and decode(SPZT,0,'未审核',1,'已审核')=#{shzt}
